Experienced Inventory Officer Job at Beaumont Woods and Furniture




        
    

        
        Beaumont Woods and Furniture is a furniture manufacturing company based in the Lekki area of Lagos State that handles woodwork, furniture installation, upholstery and general interior and exterior works.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Experienced Inventory Officer
Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Must have at least a B.Sc Degree / HND
	3 - 11 years relevant work experience.
	Close proximity to job location; Lekki Phase 1 is needed.
	Good numerical, analytical and organisational skills
	Critical thinking and problem-solving skills
	Must be computer literate and detail-oriented
	Must have experience with inventory
	Must be good with Excel.
	Must have worked in a supermarket or a high-traffic retail store.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: bsrecruitslagos@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
And
Click here to apply online

Note


	Please note that accommodation is not available, and the job location is at Lekki Phase 1, Lagos. Close proximity to the job location is important.
	Interested candidates should not call, as only qualified candidates will be contacted.
	Candidates should kindly be informed that accommodation is unavailable.

Sales Executive (Salary Loan / Wealth Management) Job at Rosabon Financial Services




        
    

        
        Rosabon Financial Services (RFS) Limited is an Award winning Rosabon Financial Services is member of the Concept Group is licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN on April 22, 1993, and being a long-standing member of the Equipment Leasing Association of Nigeria (ELAN), the organization has evolved into Nigeria’s leading Non-Banking Financial Intermediary and Equipment Leasing firm focused on niche and general markets.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive (Salary Loan / Wealth Management)
Job Locations: Lagos, Ondo, Osun and Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Scope and Impact
     

            
    




	The candidate will be tasked with the responsibility of selling various loan products.
	He / She will act as liaison between customers and our financial institution and will help qualified applicants acquire loans in a timely manner.


Job Summary


	The Rosabon Sales Executive is required to collect and prepare all materials needed to process transactions (loans and investments).
	He/ She will also responsible for reviewing loan applications evaluating the potential risks of granting loans to applicants.


Duties and Responsibilities


	Evaluate credit worthiness by processing loan applications and documentation within specified limits
	Interview applicants to determine financial eligibility and feasibility of granting loans
	Determine all applicable ratios and metrics and set up debt payment plans
	Communicate with clients either to request or to provide information
	Justify decisions (approvals/rejections) and report on them
	Complete loan contracts and counsel clients on policies and restrictions
	Review loan agreements to ensure that they are complete and accurate according to policy
	Update account records, Compute payment schedules and transactions on ERP
	Confer with underwriters to aid in resolving loan application problems.
	Update job knowledge on types of loans and other financial services
	Assess customer needs, explore all options and introduce different types of loans
	Develop referral networks, suggest alternate channels and cross-sell products and services to accomplish quotas
	Go the “extra mile” to build trust relationships, customer loyalty and satisfaction throughout the underwriting process
	Operate in compliance with laws and regulations and adhere to lending compliance guidelines
	Deposit mobilization to meet set targets


Key Performance Indicators


	Meet Set Monthly loan and investment Targets
	Reduced number of Non-Performing loans
	Customer retention rate of minimum 90% across loan and investment products


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree in Finance, Economics or a related field
	Proven working experience as a Loan Officer
	Familiarity with computers and banking applications/software
	Solid understanding of direct/indirect lending products and practices
	Customer satisfaction orientation and sales competencies
	Ability to work in a goal oriented environment and meet set target.


Salary
N90,000 - N150,000 per month.

  "title": "Operations Officer",
  "description": "Work Dey HR Services offers a wide range of HR Consulting Services to Organizations and Individuals. We match Suitable ans employable applicants to Genuine Vacancies in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Garki 2, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Are you a highly organized, proactive, and detail-oriented professional with a passion for operational excellence? Join our dynamic team at a leading media company in Garki 2, Abuja, where creativity meets strategy.
	We&rsquo;re looking for an Operations Officer who will play a key role in ensuring the smooth day-to-day running of our business, supporting production teams, managing logistics, and optimizing internal processes.


Key Responsibilities


	Coordinate daily operations across departments to ensure efficiency and timely delivery of projects
	Manage schedules, resources, and logistics for media productions and events
	Monitor and report on operational performance, identifying areas for improvement
	Liaise with vendors, clients, and internal teams to ensure seamless execution of tasks
	Maintain accurate records and documentation for operational activities
	Support compliance with company policies and industry regulations.

Applications System Engineer Job at Equinix




        
    

        
        Equinix is the world’s digital infrastructure company®, operating over 260 data centers across the globe. Digital leaders harness Equinix's trusted platform to bring together and interconnect foundational infrastructure at software speed. Equinix enables organizations to access all the right places, partners and possibilities to scale with agility, speed the launch of digital services, deliver world-class experiences and multiply their value, while supporting their sustainability goals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Applications System Engineer

Job ID: JR-151565
Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Perform daily system monitoring, verifying the availability and efficiency of all server infrastructure resources and application systems, reviewing system and application logs, and verifying completion of scheduled jobs.
	Primarily provides support to the IPNGN virtual infrastructure.
	Apply OS/Hypervisor/Firmware/applications patches and upgrades as demanded, and upgrade administrative tools and utilities.
	Perform ongoing system performance tuning, infrastructure hardware upgrades ( CPU, memory and storage infrastructure), and resource optimization as required.
	Perform monthly Infrastructure and application performance reporting to support capacity planning.
	Troubleshoot and resolve operating system and application related issues.
	Research and recommend innovative, and where possible, automated approaches for system administration tasks.
	Perform Server Hardening in line with server security best practices.
	Application servers review and deployment


Qualifications


	3-5 years of relevant experience
	B.Sc.Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering
	CCNA, REDHAT, WINDOWS, VMWARE certifications


Skills & Competences:


	Linux and windows servers administration skills required
	Working knowledge of the Linux Kernel
	Database Administration experience
	Experience supporting Vmware vSphere environment
	Networking experience will be an added advantage
	Automation experience will be an added advantage (shell scripting, Ansible)
	Practical knowledge of DNS architecture, engineering, deployment and security
	Knowledge/ Experience working with Network monitoring tools and systems is an added advantage.
